item.title: 英国公司的产量和利润受到大流行病以来的最大冲击
item.description: 据两份报告称，英国公司的商业活动下滑，盈利警告增加，每种趋势都是自大流行病以来最严重的。【原文：Business activity has slumped at British firms and profit warnings have risen, according to two reports that say each trend is the worst it’s been since the pandemic.】

item.title: 摩根大通和 PineBridge 继续看好亚洲摇摆不定的垃圾债券
item.description: 鉴于收益率上升和经济前景向好，PineBridge Investments 和摩根大通资产管理公司继续看好亚洲垃圾级债券，并将目光投向中国房地产行业的压力之外。【原文：PineBridge Investments and JPMorgan Asset Management are sticking with bullish bets for Asian junk-rated bonds given elevated yields and a supportive economic outlook, looking beyond stresses in the Chinese property sector.】

item.title: 特朗普首次贸易限制削弱市场情绪，石油价格下跌
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普总统实施了第一轮制裁和关税，此举凸显了全球经济和贸易面临的风险，石油随之下跌。【原文：Oil fell as President Donald Trump imposed his first set of sanctions and tariffs in a move that highlighted risks to the global economy and to trade.】

item.title: 豪华物流公司法拉利集团据称将于本周启动首次公开募股（IPO
item.description: 熟悉内情的人士透露，总部位于伦敦的奢侈品运输公司法拉利集团（Ferrari Group Plc）可能最早于本周宣布首次公开募股计划，这将为欧洲首次公开募股市场的复苏预期锦上添花。【原文：London-based luxury goods shipper Ferrari Group Plc may announce plans for an initial public offering as early as this week, people familiar with the matter said, adding to an anticipated recovery of the European IPO market.】

item.title: 香港房地产市场的困境正在追赶银行的步伐
item.description: 香港的不良房地产销售开始对银行造成影响，而银行过去对贷款损失有很好的保护。【原文：Distressed property sales in Hong Kong are beginning to bite banks that used to be well protected against loan losses.】

item.title: 关税仍是焦点，亚洲谨慎开市：市场综述
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）对主要贸易伙伴的贸易制裁采取了 "缓兵之计"，全球经济继续反弹，亚洲股市将谨慎上扬。美元走高。【原文：Asian stocks were set for a cautious rise as the global rebound continued from US President Donald Trump’s go-slow approach to trade sanctions on major trading partners. The dollar edged higher.】

item.title: 哥伦比亚投资者防范比索因特朗普关税而暴跌
item.description: 在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普表示将对南美国家实施一系列关税和制裁之后，哥伦比亚的资产将面临崩溃。【原文：Colombian assets are set for a rout after US President Donald Trump said he’d implement a spate of tariffs and sanctions on the South American nation.】

item.title: 本周全球商品市场值得关注的五大图表
item.description: 就在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普大谈美国化石燃料潜力之际，大型石油公司本周迎来了财报季。西非的可可困境增加了再次出现供应短缺的风险。全球最大的钴矿产商计划在价格下跌的情况下继续生产电池金属。【原文：Big Oil kicks off earnings season this week, just as US President Donald Trump talks up America’s fossil fuel potential. West Africa’s cocoa woes raise risks of another supply deficit. And the world’s top cobalt miner plans to keep churning out the battery metal despite a price rout.】

item.title: 特朗普对哥伦比亚征收关税后，美元本周开局良好
item.description: 在唐纳德-特朗普总统因哥伦比亚拒绝允许被驱逐的移民在该国登陆而对其征收关税后，美元在本周伊始小幅上涨。【原文：The dollar started the week with modest gains after President Donald Trump imposed tariffs on Colombia for refusing to allow deported migrants land in the country.】

item.title: 全球首席财务官如何应对特朗普时代的中国风险
item.description:
此外，芯片巨头台积电的财务总监谈到了资本支出和公司的海外扩张。【原文：

Plus, the finance chief of chip giant TSMC talks about capex and the company’s overseas expansion.

item.title: 特朗普给前景蒙上阴影，债券交易员将焦点转向美联储
item.description: 在债券市场上，唐纳德-特朗普上任后的第一周，至少远没有人们担心的那么不稳定。交易员们希望美联储的最新转变也是如此。【原文：In the bond market, Donald Trump’s first week, at least, turned out far less destabilizing than feared. Traders hope the same goes for the latest shift from the Federal Reserve.】

item.title: 意大利信贷机构 Sace 在沙特阿拉伯签订 66 亿美元大单
item.description: 意大利保险公司和出口信贷机构 Sace 周日表示，它在沙特阿拉伯签署了价值 66 亿美元的五项协议。【原文：Italian insurer and export credit agency Sace said Sunday that it signed five accords worth $6.6 billion in Saudi Arabia.】

item.title: 万斯称大科技公司在言论自由冲突中仍受 "关注
item.description: 副总裁万斯（JD Vance）说，在特朗普政府的领导下，大型科技公司仍然 "非常注意 "避免保守派认为是审查的内容修改。【原文：Vice President JD Vance said big tech companies remain “very much on notice” under the Trump administration to avoid content moderation that conservatives view as censorship.】

item.title: 拉脱维亚和瑞典调查波罗的海数据电缆受损事件
item.description: 周日早些时候，拉脱维亚和瑞典之间的一条海底数据电缆遭到破坏，引发了刑事调查，这是波罗的海在过去三个月中发生的第三起此类事件。【原文：A subsea data cable between Latvia and Sweden was damaged early Sunday, sparking a criminal investigation, a third such incident in the Baltic Sea in the past three months.】

item.title: 洛杉矶 "雨水充沛"，但仍面临山体滑坡风险
item.description: 南加州终于迎来了一些急需的降雨，这将为仍在与多处大火搏斗的消防员提供帮助，不过潮湿的天气也带来了山体滑坡的风险。【原文：Southern California is finally getting some much-needed rain that will assist firefighters still battling several blazes, though wet weather also brings the risk of landslides.】

item.title: 华尔街的最大希望是特朗普在移民问题上放手一搏
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）总统的移民政策已初具规模，可能会对美国企业的增长和盈利造成破坏性影响。投资者似乎还不太担心，主要是因为他们不相信特朗普会全面实施他的计划。【原文：President Donald Trump’s immigration policies are starting to take shape, with potentially devastating effects on Corporate America’s growth and earnings. Investors don’t seem too perturbed yet — largely because they don’t believe he’s going to follow through on the full extent of his plans.】

item.title: 货币波动将摧毁新兴市场套利交易
item.description: 随着唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）政府的关税威胁和美元进一步走高的前景挤压回报，新兴市场投资者对套利交易越来越警惕。【原文：Emerging market investors are turning increasingly wary of carry trades as the threat of tariffs from the Donald Trump administration and the prospect of further dollar gains squeeze returns.】

item.title: 苹果仍是 AR 领域的威胁，而 Meta 和谷歌则遥遥领先
item.description: 在为消费者制造增强现实眼镜的竞争中，Meta 和谷歌一马当先，但苹果仍是一个隐隐约约的威胁。此外：这家 iPhone 制造商为其 Siri 和人工智能工作请来了一位 "掮客"，而该公司也要对其长期以来的董事长作出决定。与此同时，三星刚刚发布了令人印象深刻的新人工智能功能，并准备凭借一款轻薄的智能手机击败苹果进入市场。【原文：Meta and Google have jumped out ahead in the race to make augmented reality glasses for consumers, but Apple remains a looming threat. Also: The iPhone maker brings in a fixer for its Siri and AI efforts, and the company has a decision to make about its longtime chairman. Samsung, meanwhile, just unveiled impressive new AI features and is poised to beat Apple to market with a skinny smartphone.】

item.title: 科技行业 15 万亿美元的反弹取决于高风险的盈利拉锯战
item.description: 投资者正在进入又一个关键的大型科技公司盈利周期，这些公司的股价接近历史最高点，估值也在不断攀升。这次的关键区别在于该集团的利润增长速度预计将是近两年来最慢的。【原文：Investors are heading into yet another pivotal Big Tech earnings cycle with the companies’ shares near record highs and valuations stretched. A key distinction this time: The group’s profit growth is projected to come in at the slowest pace in almost two years.】

item.title: 在 Ifop 民意调查中，马克龙的支持率降至历史最低点
item.description: 根据Ifop为《星期日报》（Le Journal du Dimanche）进行的民意调查，埃马纽埃尔-马克龙的支持率跌至2017年就任法国总统以来的最低点。【原文：Emmanuel Macron’s approval rating has fallen to the lowest since he became French president in 2017, according to a poll by Ifop for Le Journal du Dimanche.】

item.title: 帝亚吉欧无意出售健力士和酩悦轩尼诗股份
item.description: 帝亚吉欧集团（Diageo Plc）周日发表声明称，不打算出售健力士啤酒品牌或其持有的酩悦轩尼诗（Moet Hennessy）股份。【原文：Diageo Plc doesn’t plan to sell the Guinness beer brand or its stake in Moet Hennessy, according to a statement Sunday.】

item.title: 葡萄牙坚持 TAP 必须保留里斯本枢纽和主要航线，TSF 称
item.description: 据葡萄牙 TSF 电台网站援引基础设施部长米格尔-平托-卢斯的话报道，葡萄牙政府重申，只有在保证国有航空公司 TAP SA 保留里斯本枢纽和战略航线的情况下，才会推进该公司的私有化计划。【原文：Portugal’s government reiterated that the planned privatization of state-owned airline TAP SA will only go ahead if it can guarantee that the carrier keeps its hub in Lisbon and its strategic routes, radio TSF reported on its website, citing Infrastructure Minister Miguel Pinto Luz.】

item.title: 中国加强指数投资，为重振市场做出最新努力
item.description: 中国宣布了促进指数投资产品发展的新措施，这是中国在动荡的外部经济环境中为支撑萎靡不振的股票市场所做的最新努力。【原文：China announced new measures to promote the development of index investment products, its latest effort to shore up the ailing equity market as it embraces a turbulent external economic environment.】

item.title: S.韩联社称韩国检察官以叛乱罪起诉尹炳世
item.description: 韩联社称，韩国检方指控总统尹锡烈上月试图对韩国实施戒严令，但未遂，因此在对其立案调查期间，这位被弹劾的领导人被迫继续被拘留。【原文：South Korean prosecutors charged President Yoon Suk Yeol for his failed attempt last month to place the country under martial law, Yonhap News Agency said, forcing the impeached leader to remain in detention as they build a case against him.】

item.title: Mediobanca 在 Paschi 主动竞购后准备抗辩
item.description: Mediobanca SpA 的首席执行官表示，较小的竞争对手 Banca Monte dei Paschi di Siena SpA 的收购企图是主动提出的，这家意大利投资银行准备作出回应，并可能为自己辩护。【原文：Mediobanca SpA’s chief executive officer said a takeover attempt by smaller rival Banca Monte dei Paschi di Siena SpA was unsolicited, as the Italian investment bank prepared to respond and possibly defend itself.】

item.title: 世界银行敦促巴基斯坦将投资增加一倍以促进增长
item.description: 世界银行的一位高级官员表示，巴基斯坦必须简化法规并使其经济前景具有可预见性，以吸引更多投资并大幅刺激经济增长。【原文：Pakistan must simplify regulations and make its economic outlook predictable to attract more investment and significantly spur growth, according to a senior official from the World Bank.】

item.title: 里夫斯被要求坦承放松管制的政治风险
item.description: 英国政府促进经济增长的新思路其实是老生常谈：放松对企业的管制。对于资金短缺、已经加大税收力度的工党政府来说，这一招的吸引力在于它是免费的。【原文：The UK government’s new idea to boost growth is in fact an old favorite: business-friendly deregulation. The appeal, for a cash-strapped Labour administration that’s already ramped up taxes, is that it’s free.】

item.title: 英国公司耗尽 Covid 钱袋后，更多裁员迫在眉睫
item.description: 英国企业在大流行病期间积累的大量现金储备已经消耗殆尽，因此当工党的增税政策在 4 月份生效时，这些企业更有可能裁员。【原文：UK businesses have run down a mountain of cash reserves built up during the pandemic, leaving them more likely to cut jobs when Labour’s tax hikes come into effect in April.】

item.title: 民意调查显示，许多泰国人不赞成赌场和在线赌博计划
item.description: 许多泰国人仍然不赞成政府允许投资赌场和网络赌博合法化的计划，而泰国总理白通丹-西那瓦（Paetongtarn Shinawatra）则试图向民众保证这一举措将带来经济效益。【原文：Many Thais still disapprove of the government’s plan to allow investments in casinos and the legalization of online gambling as Prime Minister Paetongtarn Shinawatra sought to assure citizens the initiative would bring economic benefits.】

item.title: Coinbase 首席执行官称新代币激增导致评估更加困难
item.description: Coinbase Global Inc. 的首席执行官表示，该公司需要重新思考如何列出和评估每周产生的大量新代币。【原文：Coinbase Global Inc.’s CEO said the company needs to rethink how it lists and evaluates the slew of new tokens getting created each week.】
